Menace
[i]Diligence[/i] – At the beginning of your end step, if Siegbert, Diligent Heir is tapped, create a tapped Treasure token and put a +1/+1 counter on him.
[i]Responsibility of an Heir[/i] – Whenever you attack, you may sacrifice another permanent. If you do, create two 1/1 white Soldier creature tokens.
